docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A CLASSIC school lunch -fried chicken, mashed potatoes with gravy, steamed vegetables, cheese biscuits with butter and a peach half with whipped cream - has about as much to do with healthful eating as does the typical fare at fast-food outlets.
